modName: Rakshanna CBBE - ECE - Face and Body Preset AIO
summary:
Rakshanna Revised Face and Body Preset

Consolidating my 3 mods onto one webpage so it is easier to track and update.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Pz7qSG7l.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][/center][/size] [center][size=6][color=#ff0000] ECE Face Presets - Version 3.0/3.1[/color][/size]
[color=#00ff00][size=3]Dont forget to endorse!! :)[/size][/color][/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/eWdtxSb.png[/img][/center]
[center][color=#ff7700][size=5]Picture Index:[/size][/color][/center]
[center]Picture 1 = Version 3 Rakshanna Face Preset Main Picture Title
Picture 2 = Version 3 Rakshanna Face Preset
Picture 3 = Version 3 Rakshanna Face Preset
Picture 4 = Version 3 Rakshanna Face Preset
Picture 5 = Version 2 Rakshanna Face Preset
Picture 6 = Version 2 Rakshanna Face Preset
Picture 7 = Version 1 Rakshanna Face Preset
Picture 8 = Full View Armored Body Preset
Picture 9 = Chest View Armored Body Preset
Picture 10 = Chest View Armored Body Preset
Picture 11 = Full View Unarmored Body Preset
Picture 12 = Chest View Unarmored Body Preset
Picture 13 = Chest View Unarmored Body Preset
Picture 14 = Back Side Both Armored and Unarmored




[color=#ff7700][size=5]Change Log:
[/size][/color]
-July-12-15: Removed RaceMenu File

(Im not good with RM or know how to properly make a file for it, so its going to be removed till i know how or if someone wants to make a second mod as a RM option )


[color=#00ff00][size=4]Hey guys! I have decided that I am going to upload my face and body presets into one consolidated mod page so its easier to find and update. I have finally found my Rakshanna face that I have spent almost 3 months trying to find, and I think I may have found it! I am not sure if my original mods are going to stay up or not but we will see soon. Anyways here are the mods!! Enjoy!!

Also hoping to have a Rakshanna follower made with the Version 3.0 Face. It will take me some time for as I know very little about making followers.[/size][/color]


[size=3][color=#0000ff]Having troubles getting a good screen shot?[/color]
[size=2][color=#00ff00]~~~ 'tfc 1' in 3rd person view ~~~
~~~ 'sucsm 1'  0.1 to 99.9 Speed varies ~~~[/color]
[color=#0000ff]Your Welcome![/color][/size][/size][/center]

[center][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/eWdtxSb.png[/img]


[youtube]vTJ-xO3xLV4[/youtube][/center][color=#ff7700]
[/color][center][color=#ff0000][size=4][size=3][u][size=4][color=#ff7700]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eWdtxSb.png[/img]
[/color]
[/size][/u][color=#ff7700][size=5]Required Mods:[/size][/color][u][size=4][size=4][size=3][size=4][u]
[/u][/size][/size][/size][/size][/u][color=#ffffff][size=4][size=4][size=3][size=4][size=2]
-Enhanced Character Edit (Face Preset)
-SKSE 1.6.9 or 1.6.13 - For ECE (Face Preset)
-Skyrim 1.8.151 or 1.9.32 - For ECE (Face Preset)

[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/color][color=#ffffff][size=4][size=4][size=3][size=4][size=2]-CBBE Beauty Edition (Body Preset)
-Bodyslide and outfit studio (Body Preset)
-Skyrim 1.8.151 or 1.9.32 (Body Preset)[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/color][u][size=4]

[/size][/u][size=4][color=#ffffff][size=2]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE - [/size][/color][/size][size=4][color=#ff0000][size=4][size=3][color=#1e84cc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?][size=4][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?[/size][/size][/url][/color][/size][/size][/color][/size][u][size=4][color=#ff0000][size=4][size=3][u][size=4]
[/size][/u][/size][/size][/color][/size][/u][color=#ffffff][size=2]Enhanced Character Edit - [/size][/color][color=#1e84cc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?[/size][/url][/color][u][size=4][color=#ff0000][size=4][size=3][u][size=4]
[/size][/u][/size][/size][/color][/size][/u][color=#ffffff][size=2]SKSE for Skyrim - [/size][/color][color=#1e84cc][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][size=2]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/size][/url][/color][u][size=4][color=#ff0000][size=4][size=3][u][size=4]

[/size][/u][/size][/size][/color]

[/size][/u][size=4][color=#ff7700][size=5]Recommended Mods:[/size] [/color][color=#ffffff][size=2]
To look 100% like screens need these other mods below[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff]
[size=2]-Brows - High Resolution ~~~ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?[/url]
-ApachiiSkyHair v1.6 or v1.5 ~~~ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?[/url]
-SG Textures Renewal -CBBE ~~~ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?[/url]
-The Eyes of Beauty ~~~ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?[/url][/size][/color]
[color=#f4f4f4][size=2]-KSHairdos 1-2 ~~~ [color=#1e84cc]Sorry going to have to Google it[/color][/size][/color]

[/size][u][size=4]

[/size][/u][/size][/size][/color][size=4][size=3][color=#ff7700][size=5]Installation For Body Preset:[/size][/color]
[size=2]
1. Do not use NMM for installation, it will not work.
2. Download and install requirement mods. Install recommended mods to look like screenshots.
3. Download this Body Preset save file.
4. Copy the file and paste to Skyrim/Data/CalienteTools/Bodyslide/Sliderpresets
5. Start up Bodyslide.exe and build your body and batch build to your armors![/size][/size][/size]



[color=#ff0000]
[/color][size=4][size=3][color=#ff7700][size=5]Installation For Face Preset:[/size][/color][size=4]
[/size][size=2]
1. Do not use NMM for installation, it will not work.
2. Download and install requirement mods. Install recommended mods to look like screenshots.
3. Download this CME/Slot save file.[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60039/?][/url]
4. Copy the slot file and paste to my document/my games/skyrim/CME_save/
5. Start the game and go to character creation menu by using "showracemenu" command and go to slot load and find the preset.
If you did not edit the file it should be Slot 10. [/size][/size][/size][/center]

[center][color=#ff7700][size=5]Old Mods:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60039/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60039/?[/url] ~~~ Rakshanna Body
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59271/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59271/?[/url] ~~~ Rakshanna V1 Faces
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63970/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63970/?[/url] ~~~ Rakshanna v2 Faces[/center]
